entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre late this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016
